  • Constructor Details

    • Robot

      public Robot​(com.qualcomm.robotcore.eventloop.opmode.LinearOpMode opMode)
      Instantiates all motors and sensors to be used.
      Parameters:
      opMode - the LinearOpMode to be passed when instantiated in the opmode

  • Method Details

    • moveCardinal

      public double[] moveCardinal​(double power, double angleHold)
      Strafes the robot in the direction of the specified angle at the power provided until powers are set back to 0.
      Parameters:
      power - power/speed of robot during movement (between 0 and 1)
      angleHold - angle of movement for the robot (in degrees)
      Returns:
      calculated powers to spin each wheel at to create the desired movement

    • moveCardinal

      public void moveCardinal​(double maxPower, double distance, double angleHold)
      Strafes the robot in the direction of the specified angle at the maxPower provided for a certain distance. Slowly ramps up/down speed of robot to prevent slippage.
      Parameters:
      maxPower - greatest power/speed of robot during movement (between 0 and 1)
      distance - distance to travel in specified direction (meters)
      angleHold - direction to translate towards (in degrees)

    • rotate

      public void rotate​(double angularPower)
      Rotates the robot at the specified angular power until powers are set back to 0.
      Parameters:
      angularPower - Angular power to spin robot at. Negative angularPower means clockwise rotation.

    • rotate

      public void rotate​(double angularPower, double angle)
      Rotates the robot at the specified angular power to reach a final angle
      Parameters:
      angularPower - Angular power to spin robot at.
      angle - Angle (in degrees) to rotate from current orientation. Negative angle means clockwise rotation.
